line_1: And twenty more things much too tedious to mention.
line_2: What banker stopt payment with evil intention,

line_1: In a speech that he made 'em too tedious to mention;
line_2: Till Jove to the Gods signified his intention

line_1: What is this power, you're loth to mention,
And modern Plays, that I could mention,
line_2: With Judgment fraught, and rare Invention

line_1: And modern Plays, that I could mention,
line_2: Are wrote with much the same Intention;

line_1: The thing I dread to mention?
And those ingredients I shall mention,
And those ingredients I shall mention,
line_2: I'm sure will answer my intention.
